summary: Dan really doesn't want to be filmed or photographed huh!Hope it's so because he wants to keep his work & projects to himself...
body:
Dan really doesn’t want to be filmed or photographed huh!Hope it’s so because he wants to keep his work & projects to himself till the right time arrives and not because he’s uncomfortable with the Phandom’s intrusiveness.

“Dan Howell’s left the room coz I was filming”

summary: I feel so sorry for Dan.. he is clearly still not happy being in the public eye. The poor guy just wants to try something...
body:
I feel so sorry for Dan.. he is clearly still not happy being in the public eye. The poor guy just wants to try something different, and out of view of us.

I hope his week at the creative retreat has helped him decide which direction to go and that now he flies out to Florida to spend time away with Phil.

blog.name: why-do-they-call-it-spoons
blog.title: Changing Society One Post At A Time.
blog.description: 16|F|English|loves Dan and Phil| wants to make new friends| exists ?

summary: I am going on a rampage.
body:
I am going on a rampage.

I am a bit fed up with all the negativity going around surrounding Dan and Phil. But mostly Dan.

We are all welcome to our own opinions, but I also know that the expression of these opinions can cause deep rifts.

So from now on I will only be posting and revlogging the positive of the situation, as well as views that support my views. If anyone disagrees with this please feel free to message me with your point.

summary: So i was watching Hazel's instagram stories and she was showing everyone in the room and she said, "Dan has left the room...
body:
So i was watching Hazel’s instagram stories and she was showing everyone in the room and she said, “Dan has left the room because i started filming”

I don’t know what to say but i think our boy is working on himself and we are in for a treat when he does decide to come back

Or maybe it’s just because we are so content deprived that we will jump on that vid even if it has like 2 seconds of him in the frame

body: we’ll know of dan’s projects when he tells us about it, in the mean time, let’s just chill for a bit, alright? he’s taking a break and he was on a writer’s retreat and honestly? good for him. he’s doing what he needs to. let’s do what we need to and just lay back, relax and support our babies.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: We’re starting to see a shift.
body:
We’re starting to see a shift.

A few months ago, the majority of the Phandom was very pro-hiatus. Very pro-self care, pro-taking breaks, pro-looking after your own needs and taking your time, pro-“you don’t owe anybody shit”

But now? People are getting antsy. People are getting worried. People are getting bored and uninterested and people are getting pissed. Rightfully so.

When Dan comes back, if he ever does, he’s going to have a real uphill battle on his hands. I hope he’s ready.

reblog.comment:
